Need help reading this?

Slider

A horizontal or vertical fader.

Slider

Extends CanvasWidget

Static Members
▸ defaults

A set of default property settings for all Slider instances. Defaults can be overridden by user-defined properties passed to construtor.

defaults
▸ create([props])

Create a new Slider instance.

create(props: [Object])
Parameters
props ([Object]) A dictionary of properties to initialize Slider with.
Instance Members
▸ style

The style property can be either 'horizontal' (the default) or 'vertical'. This determines the orientation of the Slider instance.

style
▸ draw()

Draw the Slider onto its canvas context using the current .__value property.

draw()
▸ processPointerPosition(e)

Generates a value between 0-1 given the current pointer position in relation to the Slider's position, and triggers output.

processPointerPosition(e: PointerEvent)
Parameters
e (PointerEvent) The pointer event to be processed.

CanvasWidget

CanvasWidget is the base class for widgets that use HTML canvas elements.

CanvasWidget

Extends DOMWidget

Static Members
▸ create()

Create a new CanvasWidget instance

create()
▸ createElement()

Create a the canvas element used by the widget and set some default CSS values.

createElement()
Instance Members
▸ defaults

A set of default colors and canvas context properties for use in CanvasWidgets

defaults
▸ ctx

Store a reference to the canvas 2D context.

ctx

Button

A Button with three different styles: 'momentary' triggers a flash and instaneous output, 'hold' outputs the buttons maximum value until it is released, and 'toggle' alternates between outputting maximum and minimum values on press.

Button

Extends CanvasWidget

Static Members
▸ defaults

A set of default property settings for all Button instances. Defaults can be overridden by user-defined properties passed to construtor.

defaults
▸ create([props])

Create a new Button instance.

create(props: [Object])
Parameters
props ([Object]) A dictionary of properties to initialize a Button instance with.
Instance Members
▸ style

The style property can be 'momentary', 'hold', or 'toggle'. This determines the interaction of the Button instance.

style
▸ draw()

Draw the Button into its canvas context using the current .__value property and button style.

draw()

Menu

A HTML select element, for picking items from a drop-down menu.

Menu

Extends DOMWidget

Static Members
▸ defaults

A set of default property settings for all Menu instances. Defaults can be overridden by user-defined properties passed to construtor.

defaults
▸ create([props])

Create a new Menu instance.

create(props: [Object])
Parameters
props ([Object]) A dictionary of properties to initialize a Menu with.
Instance Members
▸ options

The options array stores the different possible values for the Menu widget. There are used to create HTML option elements which are then attached to the primary select element used by the Menu.

options
▸ createElement()

Create primary DOM element (select) to be placed in a Panel.

createElement()
▸ createOptions()

Generate option elements for menu. Removes previously appended elements.

createOptions()

DOMWidget

DOMWidget is the base class for widgets that use HTML canvas elements.

DOMWidget

Extends Widget

Static Members
▸ create()

Create a new DOMWidget instance

create()
▸ createElement()

Create a DOM element to be placed in a Panel.

createElement()
▸ place()

use CSS to position element element of widget

place()
Instance Members
▸ defaults

A set of default property settings for all DOMWidgets

defaults
▸ element

The DOM element used by the DOMWidget

element
▸ rect

Bounding box, in absolute coordinates, of the DOMWidget

rect

Widget

Widget is the base class that all other UI elements inherits from. It primarily includes methods for filtering / scaling output.

Widget
Static Members
▸ widgets

store all instantiated widgets.

widgets
▸ defaults

A set of default property settings for all widgets

defaults
▸ create()

Create a new Widget instance

create()
Instance Members
▸ filters

Stores filters for transforming widget output.

filters
▸ init()

Initialization method for widgets. Checks to see if widget contains a 'target' property; if so, makes sure that communication with that target is initialized.

init()
▸ output()

Calculates output of widget by running .__value property through filter chain. The result is stored in the .value property of the widget, which is then returned.

output()
▸ transmit()

If the widget has a remote target (not a target inside the interface web page) this will transmit the widgets value to the remote destination.

transmit()
